pages.text: Cinnamon is a spice obtained from the inner bark of trees. Cinnamon is used mainly as an aromatic condiment and flavouring additive in a wide variety of cuisines.

Cinnamon bark is used as a spice. It is principally employed in cookery as a condiment and flavouring material. It is used in the preparation of chocolate. Cinnamon is often used in savoury dishes of chicken and lamb.
